title: At Once
description: At Once is an app for two types of users: restaurants and clients. Restaurants will be able to introduce their dishes and menu in order to show them to their customers online. Clients, on the other hand, will be able to look at the menu through a link and order directly from it. Their orders will be sent to the restaurant dashboard and they will not need to interact with each other. This will be really useful to avoid unnecessary human contact due to the current situation.
technologies: Full stack project built using Express, HBS, Node and MongoDB.

title: Splitapp
description: Splitapp is an app to manage costs and expenses among mates. It will let you to keep track of all your costs (the receipts you have paid for) and your expenses (the proportional part of a cost your friends owe to you).The costs can be introduced manually or by scanning a ticket. If you choose to scan a ticket, you will be able to select the imports you want to add among all of them. An easy way to know who you owe money to or who owes you money.
technologies: Single page application built with ReactJs.

title: Catalogue
description: Create catalogue layouts for products and price lists.

title: Illustrations
description: Create christmas, wedding and holy communion cards for our clients and select the best paper to print them on

title: Product Design
description: Think, design and create collections to offer a personal and elegant product to our clients
